tools.name: brain_dump_organize
tools.description: Transform unstructured thoughts into a structured markdown todolist. Will not overwrite existing files unless overwrite=true.

tools.name: enhance_todolist
tools.description: Enhance an existing todolist with more detailed specifications, acceptance criteria, and technical requirements. Will not overwrite existing files unless overwrite=true.

tools.name: find_next_task
tools.description: Identify the next logical unchecked task to implement from the todolist.

tools.name: plan_task_implementation
tools.description: Create a detailed implementation plan for a specific task.

tools.name: task_executor
tools.description: Execute a planned task by implementing the necessary file operations based on the implementation plan. Use validate_plan=true to preview actions without executing them.

tools.name: mark_task_complete
tools.description: Mark a specific task as complete in the todolist.

tools.name: create_file
tools.description: Create a new file with the specified content in the workspace.

tools.name: edit_file
tools.description: Edit an existing file by applying changes (replace, append, prepend, insert_at_line).

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Delete a file from the workspace.

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move a file from one location to another within the workspace.

tools.name: copy_file
tools.description: Copy a file from one location to another within the workspace.

tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: Create a new directory in the workspace.

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List the contents of a directory in the workspace.

tools.name: delete_directory
tools.description: Delete a directory from the workspace.

tools.name: batch_operations
tools.description: Execute multiple file/directory operations in a single batch.
